content: hibernate for the season in this irresistible crochet hoodie stitched in our soft and fluffy bernat forever fleece this oversized garment is worked flat in single_crochet seaming all the pieces together adds just the right amount of structure to ensure your hoodie has the perfect fit complete with a spacious kangaroo patch pocket for stashing treats this hoodie is a sure hit on movie night materials bernat® forever fleece™ 9 9 oz/280 g 194 yds/177 m corduroy 61028 xs/xl 10 balls 2/5xl 14 balls finished chest measurement xs/xl 65 165 cm 2/5xl 84 213 5 cm
